mapper.select: select b.id, b.title, DATE_FORMAT(b.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as update_time, b.recommend, b.published, b.type_id, t.id as tid, t.name from blog.blog b left outer join blog.type t on b.type_id=t.id order by b.update_time desc

select id, title, content, first_picture as firstPicture, flag, views, comment_count as commentCount, appreciation, share_statement as shareStatement, commentable, published, recommend, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, description, type_id as typeId, user_id as userId from blog.blog where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into blog.blog (id,title, content, first_picture, flag, views, comment_count, appreciation, share_statement, commentable, published, recommend, create_time, update_time, description, type_id, user_id) values (#{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{firstPicture}, #{flag}, #{views}, #{commentCount}, #{appreciation}, #{shareStatement}, #{commentable}, #{published}, #{recommend}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{description}, #{typeId}, #{userId});
